resources.string: 1. What are the minimum necessary ingredients to make yeast bread?
2. What is the difference between bread flour and all-purpose flour?
All-purpose flour cannot be used for bread, whereas bread flour can be used for bread.
Bread flour is harvested in the fall, whereas all-purpose flour is harvested in the spring.
Bread flour contains more gluten than all-purpose flour.
3. What is the role of fat when added to bread dough?
4. Fill in the blank: Kneading the dough helps form ______.
5. What is the role of eggs when added to bread dough?
Adds fat to the bread dough.
Provides additional lift to the bread.
